about_the_game:
Gaming's favourite Heavy Weapons Guy has found himself 2Far west of 2Fort. Armed with only a minigun and a (never ending) Sandvich, his only way back to the war on BLU is through the cowfolk he's surrounded by.

The Heavy is a fully animated custom character created by Bandit-1, generously granted permission for use by Valve and the Team Fortress 2 team!

Create your own custom characters and share them with the world using Steam Workshop.
